meanings.sent1: The water in the pond looked unpure and smelled strange.
meanings.sent2: The unpure ingredients in the recipe affected the taste of the dish.
meanings.sent3: He tried to clean the unpure stain on his shirt but only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: The unpure thoughts in his mind clouded his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The unpure air in the room made it hard to breathe.

meanings.sent1: The unpure intentions behind his actions were evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She refused to be associated with the unpure dealings of the company.
meanings.sent3: The unpure behavior of the character in the movie added an interesting twist to the plot.
meanings.sent4: His unpure soul was reflected in his deceitful smile.
meanings.sent5: The unpure nature of the crime left a stain on the community.

meanings.definition: Not clean or clear; dirty or cloudy.
meanings.sent1: The unpure glass window distorted the view outside.
meanings.sent2: The unpure liquid in the container had a foul smell.
meanings.sent3: She tried to see through the unpure water but couldn't make out what was at the bottom.
meanings.sent4: The unpure sky was covered with dark clouds before the storm.
meanings.sent5: The unpure mirror reflected a distorted image of her face.
